item.title: Teleport Underground?
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

Here is a mini lesson. The world cannot have a “Underground height” as the game supports only 4 height on the same axis.

You are on ground 0 when you first start out, going up a ladder will result in going up by one height. If you go to lets say, height 5, you will be on ground “0” again as the world repeats itself every 4 height.

So, if you would like to go underground, you would have to find another set of cords that acts like its underground.

In your case, the Barrows field does not have a house, or anything like that, so if you go to heightLevel -1, I believe it takes you high above the battle grounds.

Read full topic

item.title: Teleport Underground?
item.dc:creator: @guitars595 guitars595
item.description:
@guitars595 wrote:

Okay I made a portal above ground that will take me under ground to the Barrows Brothers coffins. But when I click on it, it teleports me to the right spot I chose by makes me go like 5 feet up in the air. Here is the code case 881: if (actionTimer == 0) { teleportToX = 3557; teleportToY = 3297; heightLevel -= 1; actionTimer = 2; sendMessage("You climb down the hole into Verac's Tomb"); } break;
Can anyone help me?

Read full topic
